meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one trillion ohms.
meanings.sent1: The electronic device had a resistance of teraohms, making it very efficient.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the resistance of the circuit in teraohms.
meanings.sent3: The robot claimed it needed a trillion ohms of resistance, but it was just being dramatic with teraohms.
meanings.sent4: The teraohms of resistance in the wire were like a fortress, blocking the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent5: The concept of teraohms can be compared to a giant dam holding back the electrical current.
